short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to bookmark the progress / scroll percentage of the current a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a bookmark on the current site that saves the scroll percentage as well. When opening the bookmark again, it will automatically scroll back to the saved location.
